text: Avara (gatakalada dutarugala) hejje gurutugala mele navu maryamara putra isarannu kalisidevu – taurat‌na paiki avara (yahudigala) bali ulididda bhagavannu drdhikarisuvavaragi. Hageye navu avarige (isarige) injil annu nididevu. Adaralli margadarsana mattu prakasavide. Adu taurat‌na paiki avara bali ulidiruva bhagavannu samarthisuttade mattu adu devabhaktara palige margadarsi hagu upadesavagide
